text: نُمَتِّعُهُمْ قَلِيلًا ثُمَّ نَضْطَرُّهُمْ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍ

translation.en.sahih: We grant them enjoyment for a little; then We will force them to a massive punishment.
translation.id.indonesian: Kami biarkan mereka bersenang-senang sebentar, kemudian Kami paksa mereka (masuk) ke dalam siksa yang keras.
